doc:
Ben Lyon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Lyon 0 Ben Lyon (February 6, 1901 – March 22, 1979) was an American film actor and a studio executive at 20th Century Fox, who later acted in British radio, films and TV. Ben_Lyon ( February_6_,_1901 – March_22_,_1979 ) was an_American_film_actor and a_studio_executive at 20th_Century_Fox , who later acted in British_radio , films and TV .
